review: I just installed Amazon Fire TV yesterday and was immediately impressed with the ease of getting it running and with the picture and sound quality.  I mostly bought it for the ability to easily stream Amazon Prime videos, Netflix and Hulu Plus but was impressed with the other apps available and the free programming some of them provide.  Over time, as a few more of these apps become available I could see dropping or greatly reducing my cable.  I am disappointed that the voice search features do not work with Netflix.  I hope Amazon gets that changed soon.  I would also appreciate the ability to search for programming across the installed apps instead of each separately.  (If that can be done I can't figure out how???).  Overall I am very happy with the purchase.
author: John Anderson
